t: About Us | Cavallo Premium Equestrian Brand with Heritage
s: Cavallo was founded in 1978 as a riding boot manufacturing facility in Bad Oeynhausen. Shortly after its foundation, the company became the market leader in the riding boot sector and has since established itself as the most prominent brand in international equestrian sport.
